resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

If you wish to save recorded trajectories to your files select Save to Files option. To send data to the server enter your id below. Wait for WiFi option allows you to choose to only send data when connected to WiFi.
Set your location by placing a pin on the map.\nOnce set, add a pin in the direction you are facing.

PathFinder aids research in indoor positioning, creating indoor building maps, and assessing building hotspots.\nThe app collects data from the following sensors: Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Magnetometer, Barometer, Location, WiFi, Ambient Light, Proximity, Rotation and Activity data.\nThese data are used to trace your position as you walk around a building, and are submitted to an online database.

To achieve the best results with PathFinder, try holding your phone in a consistent orientation, and take regular steps with an exaggerated motion, to assist the step detection algorithms. Recognising floor changes can take time, as such continuous floor changes are discouraged.
